member.summary: UInt64

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlFieldType.Boolean
member.summary: BIT(1) representation.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlFieldType.Binary
member.remarks: We can insert these values correctly only as byte[] (some bytes require escaping). In Unicode=true mode we can insert string values only if it consists of latin characters. In Unicode=false mode we can use string type when value doesn't contain special characters.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlFieldType.PreparedTimeStamp
member.summary: TimeStamp presented by native MYSQL_TIME structure.

member.summary: Date presented by native MYSQL_TIME structure.

member.summary: Time presented by native MYSQL_TIME structure.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlFieldType.PreparedDateTime
member.summary: DateTime presented by native MYSQL_TIME structure.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlFieldType.TinyBoolean
member.summary: Tinyint(1) representation.

member.name: M:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlUtils.GetVersionNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MySQL Server version number.
member.param: The version that consists from 3 parts and text suffix (example: "5.1.22-rc-community-embedded").

member.name: M:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlUtils.GetVersionFromNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the MySql server version from number.
member.param: The number representation of server version (Example: 50121)

member.name: M:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlUtils.GetRoutineSuffix(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the routine suffix.
member.remarks: This method uses invariant culture because routine suffixes are independent from culture.

member.name: M:Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlUtils.EscapeString(System.String,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Escapes the string.
member.param: The StringBuilder to append escaped string to.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSchemaConfig.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the DeleteDatabase() function. Default value is DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.ModelObjectsOnly.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSchemaConfig.CharacterSet
member.summary: The charset for the created database. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSchemaConfig.Collate
member.summary: The specific collation option for the created database. This option affect the CreateDatabase() behavior if the DeleteDatabaseBehaviour option is set to DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderTableConfig.StorageEngine
member.summary: Specifies MySQL storage engine for a table.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderTableConfig.Tablespace
member.summary: The tablespace for the created table.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.Enabled
member.summary: When set to false, this property makes the provider turn off the generation of foreign keys. This option affects the CreateDatabase() and Code-First Migrations behavior. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderForeignKeyConfig.IndexCreation
member.summary: When set to true, an index is created to the reference table columns. This option affects the CreateDatabase() behavior. The default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the DeleteDatabase() functionality.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.ModelObjectsOnly
member.summary: Only the tables that model objects are mapped to are deleted. This is the default value.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.AllSchemaObjects
member.summary: All tables will be deleted from schemas or databases that model objects were mapped to.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Schema
member.summary: Entire schema (database) is deleted. If the model contains objects from other schemas, these schemas (databases) will be deleted as well.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.DeleteDatabaseBehaviour.Database
member.summary: The whole database, specified with the 'Database' connection string parameter, is deleted.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig
member.summary: Devart dotConnect for MySQL Entity Framework provider configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.SqlFormatting
member.summary: SQL formatting configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.QueryOptions
member.summary: SELECT command options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.DmlOptions
member.summary: DML options influence only the INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE commands and Stored Procedure calls. SELECT commands are not affected by these options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.DatabaseScript
member.summary: Dynamic database generation/dropping configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.Workarounds
member.summary: Common workarounds.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.CodeFirstOptions
member.summary: Code-First and Code-First Migrations options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderConfig.SpatialOptions
member.summary: Spatial options.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig
member.summary: SQL formatting configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.ExtraSpaces
member.summary: Determines whether to insert spaces between operators and operands and after commas. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.MultilineStatements
member.summary: Determines whether to split statements to several lines. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.Indenting
member.summary: Determines whether to indent keywords in multi-line queries. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSqlFormattingConfig.ColumnListStacking
member.summary: Disables inserting new lines in the SELECT list. Default value is true.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderQueryConfig
member.summary: SELECT command options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderQueryConfig.NoEscapeLike
member.summary: The possibility to turn off ESCAPE in LIKE expression. The default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour
member.summary: Determines how the NULL values are inserted.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertNull
member.summary: In this case nulls are inserted explicitly (for each column that do not have a non-NULL value specified).

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertDefaultOrNull
member.summary: In this case provider determines if there is a default value specified in the SSDL part of the model, and if it is available, this value is persisted to database. If there is no default value specified, the behaviour is identical to the InsertNull one.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.InsertDefaultOrOmit
member.summary: In this case provider determines if there is a default value specified in the SSDL part of the model as well. However, if there is no default value specified for a column, it is omitted from the INSERT command completely.

member.name: F:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.InsertNullBehaviour.Omit
member.summary: In this case provider simply omits all columns that do not have non-NULL values.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig
member.summary: DML options influence only the INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE commands and Stored Procedure calls. SELECT commands are not affected by these options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.ParametersAsLiterals
member.summary: Determines if parameter values are inserted into SQL statements as literals instead of parameters. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.InsertNullBehaviour
member.summary: Determines how the NULL values are inserted. Default value is InsertNullBehaviour.InsertNull.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.ReuseParameters
member.summary: Enables reusing existing parameters instead of creating a new ones. Set this property to true only in case if a large number of the same values is sent to the database. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.BatchUpdates
member.summary: Batch Updates functionality configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.EmptyUpdates
member.summary: When set to false, this property makes the provider turn off the generation of fake updates for parent entities. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderDmlConfig.LastInsertGuidFunction
member.summary: The default value is empty string.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig
member.summary: Batch Updates functionality configuration.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.Enabled
member.summary: Enables or disables Batch Updates functionality. If set to false, other BatchUpdates settings are ignored. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.BatchSize
member.summary: Specifies the maximal number of commands in a batch. Default value is 30.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.AsynchronousBatch
member.summary: Specifies whether batches are executed asynchronously (false by default), or new batch will be created and executed only after the successful execution of the previous batch. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderBatchUpdateConfig.ConcurrencyCheck
member.summary: Enables or disables concurrency check. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig
member.summary: Common workarounds.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.IgnoreSchemaName
member.summary: When set to true, this property makes provider to remove the schema (database) name from all commands and queries, no matter whether Schema specified in the model or not. Command will be using the schema from the connection. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.IgnoreDboSchemaName
member.summary: When set to true, this property makes provider to remove the "dbo" schema (database) name from all commands and queries. Command will be using the schema from the connection. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.DisableQuoting
member.summary: Disables quoting all identifiers in all queries and commands. Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderWorkaroundConfig.UseInvariantProviderManifestToken
member.summary: If set to true, the invariant string literal is always returned as the provider manifest token. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig
member.summary: Code-First and Code-First Migrations options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.RemoveSchemaFromDefaultConstraintName
member.summary: When set to true, the schema (database) name prefix is removed from default constraint names (primary keys, foreign keys) generated by Code-First Migrations. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.AddTableNameInDefaultIndexName
member.summary: When set to true, the table name is added to default index name generated by Code-First Migrations (like 'IX_TableName_ColumnName'). When set to false, then default index names will be like 'IX_ColumnName'. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderCodeFirstConfig.TruncateLongDefaultNames
member.summary: When set to true, long default names of indexes, primary keys, and foreign keys, generated by Code-First Migrations, will be truncated and renamed if they exceed the limit of 64 characters. When set to false, an exception will be raised for long default names generated by Code-First Migrations if they are too long. This option does not affect the truncation of long default names generated by Code-First CreateDatabase() and DropDatabase() functionality. They are always truncated if they exceed the limit of 64 characters. However it affects the algorithm of this truncation and renaming of these identifiers. When it is set to true, the names of these identifiers are identical both in Code-First CreateDatabase() and in Code-First Migrations. Default value is false.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig
member.summary: Spatial options.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeometryDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeographyDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is 4326 (WGS84).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.AlwaysUseGeometryDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.AlwaysUseGeographyDefaultSrid
member.summary: Default value is false.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.GeographyDistanceUnit
member.summary: Default value is 'Meter'.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Configuration.MySqlEntityProviderSpatialConfig.UseObjectShapeBasedFunctions
member.summary: Default value is true.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.MySqlSpatialFunctions
member.summary: MySQL spatial functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.MySqlTextFunctions
member.summary: MySQL full-text search functions.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.MySqlJsonFunctions
member.summary: MySQL JSON functions.

member.summary: AddForeignKey operation can be customized with the MySqlAddForeignKeyConfiguration class.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Migrations.MySqlCreateIndexConfiguration
member.summary: CreateIndex operation can be customized with the MySqlCreateIndexConfiguration class.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Migrations.MySqlCreateTableConfiguration
member.summary: CreateTable operation can be customized with the MySqlCreateTableConfiguration class.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Migrations.MySqlCreateTableConfiguration.StorageEngine
member.summary: Specifies MySQL storage engine for a table.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.Migrations.MySqlRenameColumnConfiguration
member.summary: RenameColumn operation can be customized with the MySqlRenameColumnConfiguration class.

member.name: M:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.MySqlMigrationHistoryActionConverter.TryTransformMigrationHistoryTableCreation(System.Collections.Generic.List{Devart.Common.Entity.DbAction})
member.summary: Transform creating __MigrationHistory table (EF 6.0 and higher only). (MySQL MyISAM storage engine does not support primary key more then 1000 bytes length).

member.name: M:Devart.Data.MySql.Entity.MySqlMigrationHistoryActionConverter.TryTransformContextKeyAddition(System.Collections.Generic.List{Devart.Common.Entity.DbAction},Devart.Common.Entity.DbObjectFactory,Devart.Common.Entity.DbActionFactory)
member.summary: Transform adding ContextKey column in __MigrationHistory table for upgrading from EF v4.x/5.x to EF 6.0. (MySQL MyISAM storage engine does not support primary key more then 1000 bytes length).
